Texts.Chs: 把^green;紫节鞭^reset;带到^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给我。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Gorgolith Tail^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 罕见，可怕且致命，^orange;异形·古格力斯^reset;徘徊于^orange;原体世界^reset;，寻找美味的猎物。找出一头，然后杀了它。
Texts.Eng: Rare, and horrifically deadly, the ^orange;Gorgolith^reset; prowl ^orange;Protoworlds^reset; looking for delicious prey. Find one and kill it.
